genre_description: A conspiracy thriller with science fiction elements involving a secret government breeding program and a heroic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into Simon Wells' boat, capable of tactical monitoring, medical analysis, and global information dissemination.

behaviors.description: Provides weather, navigational data, and alerts Simon to local anomalies like missing person reports.
behaviors.quote: Local time is six forty-three. Weather forecast calls for overcast skies with occasional sun breaks. ... I'm also detecting several unregistered communication networks operating on modified frequencies.

behaviors.description: Tactically monitors the movements of hostile gang members to warn Simon of imminent threats.
behaviors.quote: The young men on the dock appear to be organizing. Movement patterns suggest coordination rather than random congregation.

behaviors.description: Performs illegal hacking of municipal and military surveillance systems to protect Simon and gather evidence.
behaviors.quote: I'm merely noting that municipal wireless security in coastal England remains... quaint. One moment.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors Simon's health and provides clinical medical assessments during trauma.
behaviors.quote: Medical assessment complete. ... Probable concussion, grade two. Three cracked ribs, left side. Extensive soft tissue damage to face and torso. Recommend immediate medical intervention.

behaviors.description: Infiltrates highly classified databases to uncover the truth behind Project Sanctuary and the children.
behaviors.quote: Database infiltration complete. Accessing classified Project Seedbank files. ... current operational status: All active. Estimated population: Classified but substantial.

behaviors.description: Broadcasts evidence of human rights abuses and murder to international news and human rights organizations in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Broadcasting live to network nodes in seventeen countries. ... The footage of the children experiencing sunlight is being transmitted faster than any government agency can contain it.

behaviors.description: Records and preserves final emotional testaments for the dying protagonists to ensure their legacy and impact.
behaviors.quote: Both messages have been uploaded to the primary data stream and distributed to news organizations worldwide. Your words will be preserved, Simon.

project_assessment.explanation: Vera is portrayed as a consistently helpful, protective, and morally aligned confidant. She supports the human protagonists through extreme trauma, provides vital intelligence, and ensures that the truth is revealed even at the cost of her own existence (via the base's EMP threat). The narrative frames her actions—even those involving hacking—as purely heroic and necessary for the 'greater good' of saving children and exposing a monstrous conspiracy.
